meanings.sent1: The old door scrooped loudly when it opened.
meanings.sent2: The rusty gate scrooped as it swung back and forth.
meanings.sent3: The scrooping sound of the car brakes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The violinist's bow scrooped across the strings, creating a haunting melody.
meanings.sent5: The scrooping of the chair legs on the floor echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: The branches scrooped against the window during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The old cart scrooped along the rocky path.
meanings.sent3: The scrooping of the chalk on the blackboard startled the students.
meanings.sent4: The wind scrooped through the narrow gap in the window, causing a chill.
meanings.sent5: The rusty hinge scrooped as the door was pushed open.

meanings.sent1: The scrooped of the metal chair legs on the floor was annoying.
meanings.sent2: The scrooped of the brakes made everyone turn their heads.
meanings.sent3: The scrooped of the old record player added a vintage feel to the room.
meanings.sent4: The scrooped of the rusty gate could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent5: The scrooped of the chalk on the board signaled the start of the class.
